attributes.action: Close all nursery’s and early years learning till its safe or supply ppe & tests
attributes.additional_details: close the nursery’s and early years learning it’s not safe My partner and her family work at a nursery getting no help of ppe or tests it’s not fair they are looking after children with low hygiene skills and need close contact but who’s looking after them
